GSD.description:
f2fs: remove WARN_ON in f2fs_is_valid_blkaddr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 32bea51fe4c6e92c00403739f7547c89219bea88. For more details please see the references link.
